comments.html: "Can I save money with white box switches?" is a completely separate question from "what is SDN?"
comments.name: Gabriel

comments.html:
There are still savings to be realized from white label switches. Assuming your needs a fairly simple, a Cumulus-powered Dell switch is going to be far cheaper than a corresponding Cisco model.

You talked about margin shifting and that's true. However, the CapEx on these "dumb" switches is far lower than any of the big vendors.
comments.name: Anonymous
